column1: Little Goat Diner////The space is bright and fun.  So much going on with the coffee bar
column4: diner - I'm sort of in love with the whole thing.  And
column5: Sean (server) and James (manager) were both so gracious when I embarrassingly had to send my meal back.  Their customer service was first rate -- despite a line out the door
column6: they recognize the importance of keeping each customer happy.
